weapon_perk_ability_description:
On hitting an enemy's Weak Point, inflicts the unique ability Devotion Mark on the target enemy.
On hitting an ally, that ally's shield is restored at the cost of your MP. If your current MP is less than the MP cost, this effect is not triggered.

Defeating an enemy grants the Unique Ability Patience. 
On hitting an enemy while at Max Stacks, fires Enhanced Rounds.
On hitting an enemy with Enhanced Rounds, Patience is reset, and inflicts Stun on the enemies.

After reloading, grants one of three unique abilities at random.
If the granted effect is the same as the existing effect, the effect stage is increased. If a different effect is granted, the effect stage is reset to Stage 1.
Superb Performance
Beautiful Appearance
Awesome Feature

When using a Dimension skill grants the unique ability Single Reload for Peace.
When Single Reload for Peace is at Max Stacks, shooting while aiming rapidly fires all loaded rounds.

ability_effects.name: When aiming while at max stacks

weapon_perk_ability_description:
On hitting the enemy with all fired bullets, increases the Firearm Critical Hit Rate and Firearm Critical Hit Damage of the attack.
Upon landing a Critical Hit on an enemy, grants the Firearm's unique ability Amplification.

On hitting the enemy with all fired bullets, grants the unique ability Executor's Exaltation.
If all of the fired bullets do not hit enemies while this effect is active, decreases the effect stage by -1.
At the highest stage, firing a shot removes this effect, regardless of whether it hits a target or not.
At the highest stage, increases Firearm ATK on hit and inflicts Electrocution on the target enemy.
On hitting an Electrocuted enemy, increases Firearm ATK and applies this buff to the attack.
On hitting a Weak Point, inflicts the unique ability Prey on the target enemy.

On hitting an enemy, increase Status Effect Trigger Rate corresponding to the element (Fire/Chill/Electric/Toxic) and inflicts the unique ability Quenching to the target enemy. 
On hitting a Burned enemy, increase Firearm ATK and apply this buff to the attack.

ability_effects.name: On hitting an enemy inflited with Burn

weapon_perk_ability_description:
Granting a buff to allies excluding yourself will grant the unique effectMeditation to yourself.
Recovering an ally's (HP/Shield/MP/Custom Resources), excluding yourself, will grant the unique effectPraise to yourself.
Inflicting a debuff on an enemy will grant the unique effectGlory to yourself.

Granting a buff to allies excluding yourself will grant the unique effectMeditation to yourself.
Recovering an ally's (HP/Shield/MP/Custom Resources), excluding yourself, will grant the unique effectPraise to yourself.
Inflicting a debuff on an enemy will grant the unique effectGlory to yourself.

When using a Dimension skill, recovers Custom Resource with a set chance.
When using a Tech skill, grants the unique ability Pest Control with a set chance.

After reloading, grants the unique ability Solar Halo.
On hitting an enemy while Solar Halo is active, inflict Lunar Halo on the target enemy with a set chance.

When using a Fusion skill, grants self the unique ability Arcane Energy with a set chance.
When using a Singular skill, grants self the unique ability Purification with a set chance.

On hitting a Weak Point, inflicts the unique effect, Death Propagation. 
On hitting an enemy Commander or Colossus, increases Firearm Critical Hit Rate and applies the effect to the attack.

Aiming activates Preview Mode.
When canceling the aim, deactivates Preview Mode.
When firing while aiming, deploys the unique ability Guardian Lance on the terrain and consumes a set amount of ammo upon deployment.
The deployed Guardian Lance lasts for a set amount of time, and hitting the Guardian Lance deals damage to nearby enemies.
Each time the deployed Guardian Lance is hit, its duration and range are slightly increased.
When defeating an enemy, the defeated enemy has a set chance to discharge Electric Shockwave which deals Additional Damage to nearby enemies.

On hitting a Weak Point, inflicts damage to the enemy's Shield in proportion to their Max Shield at a set chance. The higher the Firearm Level, the closer this damage reaches the Max Limit.
When damage dealt to the enemy completely depletes the target enemy's Shield, inflict Stun with a set chance.

On hitting a Stunned enemy, increase ATK and apply the effect to the attack.
When achieving a Critical Hit on a Stunned enemy, there is a set chance to inflict Stun on the enemy.

On hitting an enemy, proc Bombardment on the enemy's location with a set chance.
Inflict Burn on enemies hit by Bombardment.

On hitting a Weak Point, inflicts Dispel on the enemy with a set chance.
When two or more enemies are hit by a single shot, there is a high chance to land a Critical Hit on the enemies while also increasing Critical Hit Damage and applying this buff to the attack.

ability_effects.name: Upon piercing two or more targets

weapon_perk_ability_description:
Fires a Sticky Bomb when shooting while aiming.
The launched bomb will automatically detonate after a certain period of time after sticking to an enemy. When aim is canceled, all attached bombs will detonate at the same time, regardless of whether the countdown has been completed.
Upon detonation, Sticky Bombs will inflict Burn on damaged enemies.

Fires a Guided Round with a set chance.
On hitting an enemy with a Guided Round, inflicts Ancient Fire to the target enemy with a set chance.

Hitting an enemy with a Stage 2 Beam inflicts Void Gaze on the target.
Hitting an enemy with a Stage 3 Beam inflicts Appalled Calling on the target. This effect is considered to be the same effect as Frostbite in some modes.
